googledriveinstitutions_file_added: A user added a file to Google Drive in a project
googledriveinstitutions_file_removed: A user removed a file from Google Drive in a project
googledriveinstitutions_file_updated: A user updated a file in Google Drive in a project
googledriveinstitutions_folder_created: A user created a folder in Google Drive in a project
googledriveinstitutions_folder_selected: A user linked a Google Drive folder to a project
googledriveinstitutions_node_authorized: A user authorized the Google Drive addon for a project
googledriveinstitutions_node_deauthorize: A user deauthorized the Google Drive addon for a project
Google Drive addon for a project deauthorized
